content: frankie s knitted stuff classic christmas stocking the first part of this pattern consists of instructions for a basic christmas stocking knitted in the round which can be used as a template for whatever colours and stitch patterns the knitter chooses the stocking measures 18cm / 7 across and 35cm / 14 from the top of the cuff to the bottom of the heel the foot is about 28cm / 11 long instructions are then given for the three colour slip_stitch tweed version pictured here gauge 10sts and 15 row = 2 ² worked in stocking stitch on 4mm / us size 6 needles the basic stocking i used 130g sirdar escape dk 110m /50g shade 0190 for this stocking and 4mm needles when working in the round i tend to use one long circular needle and the magic loop method dividing my stitches into two halves you can of course choose to work with a set of four or five double pointed needles instead the cuff cast on 80 sts join into a circle and work 14 rounds about 4 cm / 1½ in double moss stitch as follows rounds 1 & 2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round rounds 3 & 4 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end of round the leg knit 80 rounds or until the stocking measures 30 cm / 12 from the beginning the heel flap knit 20 sts these together with the last 20 sts from the previous round are the 40 heel flap stitches counting this first half row as row 1 work back and forth on these 40 sts for 20 row in stocking stitch slipping all first sts purlwise turning the heel row 1 sl 1 k24 ssk k1 turn row 2 sl 1 p11 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl 1 k12 ssk k1 turn row 4 sl 1 p13 p2tog p1 turn row 5 sl 1 k14 ssk k1 turn row 6 sl 1 p15 p2tog p1 turn row 7 sl 1 k16 ssk k1 turn row 8 sl 1 p17 p2tog p1 turn row 9 sl 1 k18 ssk k1 turn row 10 sl 1 p19 p2tog p1 turn row 11 sl 1 k20 ssk k1 turn row 12 sl 1 p21 p2tog p1 turn row 13 sl 1 k22 ssk k1 turn row 14 sl 1 p23 p2tog p1 turn you should now have 26 heel sts on your needle picking up for the foot knit the 26 heel sts and then pick up and knit 12 sts down the side of the heel using a new needle knit the 40 instep stitches changing needle again pick up and knit 12 sts up the other side of the heel and knit the next 38 sts knit the 40 instep stitches once more at this point make sure that however many needles you are using the 40 instep stitches and the 50 foot stitches are on separate needles in my case this meant
